rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm... From what a certain
innkeeper tells us...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0002
rows.name:
there are to be discount deals
at the Avaritia Bazaar today.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0003
rows.name:
We should expect anything from
half price up to 90% off.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0004
rows.name:
One does not simply pass up such
an opportunity!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0005
rows.name: Bargain days can be pretty exciting!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0006
rows.name:
Fingers crossed we'll find something
good.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0007
rows.name:
We wish to be adorned. To the
accessory shop!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0008
rows.name:
Fine purveyor of goods... Have you any
fashion accessories in vogue?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0009
rows.name: But of course, but of course!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0010
rows.name:
I recommend necklace made from
scarlet mushrooms. Only 5,000G!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0011
rows.name:
Normally, is 10,000. But today I give
discount. Special bargain day!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0012
rows.name:
Hrmm... This is almost too cheap,
if anything...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0013
rows.name:
And while it may be befitting of a
Nopon, we do not like how it may
be eaten at a moment's notice.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0014
rows.name:
What we desire is a pure, noble
accessory!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0015
rows.name: Come! To the next store!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0016
rows.name:
Hmm! This establishment is full of
curiosities...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0017
rows.name: Ah! Madam have eye for quality!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0018
rows.name:
These unique accessories, crafted
from findings of salvagers!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0019
rows.name:
Aha. You mean to say these are
all handmade.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0020
rows.name:
Pray, what might be the most valuable
item in your shop?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0021
rows.name: Meh-meh! Why, that this!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0022
rows.name:
This exquisite item made from ore of
highest grade. Salvaged in Gula,
me told!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0023
rows.name: Well! This is a fetching item!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0024
rows.name: This necklace...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0025
rows.name: It would look sublime on you, Homura!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0026
rows.name: It would suit you to a tee, Kagutsuchi!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0101
rows.name: Wha? Me?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0102
rows.name:
Oh no, I'm sure you could find
someone better...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0103
rows.name: Nonsense. You are a wonderful woman!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0104
rows.name:
Wear this necklace and we promise
you, you shall shine brighter than all
the stars in the sky!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0105
rows.name: R-really? But...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0106
rows.name: Heed our words, Homura.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0107
rows.name:
Be our mistress and you shall have
it. Our gift to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0108
rows.name: What say you?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0109
rows.name:
Huh? Your...mistress?
Me?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0110
rows.name:
That's right. You do want this
necklace, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0111
rows.name: No thanks, I'll pass.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0112
rows.name: Inconceivable!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0201
rows.name: Oh, how lovely!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0202
rows.name:
It's very dainty and beautiful. I admit,
it would suit me well.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0203
rows.name:
But are you really sure about giving me
something that pricey?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0204
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi, you are a beauty among
beauties.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0205
rows.name: Hold on, what are you getting at?!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0206
rows.name:
We can see you take great pains to
maintain your pulchritude.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0207
rows.name: Well, just like most people...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0208
rows.name:
You needn't say another word!
We understand completely!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0209
rows.name:
You do all this because you want
to be our mistress, do you not?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0210
rows.name:
No, I do not! Sorry, but I think you've
misunderstood something here!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0211
rows.name: Inconceivable!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0301
rows.name:
To think we of all people would be
turned down...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0302
rows.name: Yet we shall not let this topple us.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0303
rows.name:
For the sake of our future mistress,
 we shall purchase the necklace
ourselves!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0304
rows.name:
Tell us, fine vendor, what is the going
rate for this particular item?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0305
rows.name:
Meh-meh! You want to buy necklace?
Madam do me great service!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0306
rows.name: That come to 430,000G!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0308
rows.name: Hmm... Was today not a bargain day?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0309
rows.name:
We should expect you will be selling it
with a 90% discount today. No?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0310
rows.name:
43,000G? That like slap in face! In first
place, it precious item! It not fall into
bargain price bracket!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0311
rows.name:
Preposterous! This is the trouble
with cheapskates!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0312
rows.name: Forget it. We're leaving!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0401
rows.name: *sigh* What a royal letdown...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0402
rows.name:
Hey, Linne... I can sort of guess, but do
you mind telling us about your dream?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0403
rows.name:
Hey, Linne... I can kinda guess, but
what exactly is your dream?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0404
rows.name:
I've a hunch already, but would you
mind telling us about what is your
dream, Linne?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0405
rows.name:
Err, Linne? As much as I hate to ask...
What is your dream?

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0406
rows.name: Well asked!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0407
rows.name:
We want to hold tea parties
with the most charming
of ladies!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0408
rows.name:
And in order to do that,
we need to gather a harem
full of cute ladies!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0410
rows.name:
And we will not rest. Not until our
goal is in sight!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0411
rows.name:
Fear not. Homura, Kagutsuchi, Nia, Meleph,
Hana, Saika...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0412
rows.name:
You are all invited! You shall be a part
of our harem!

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0413
rows.name: Uh...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0414
rows.name: Ah...

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0415
rows.name:
But we realize now that it
is not so easy to have others
become our mistresses.

rows.label: kizunatalk072_msg0416
rows.name:
The road may be long...but still, we
forge ever onwards!
